name: Florida Seaplanes
baseAirport: 3FD9 -Prairie Lake Pvt Res Sp Mooring Facility
about: Florida Seaplanes, located in Orlando, FL, is a family-owned and operated flying school since 1992. We specialize in tailored flight instruction for single engine seaplanes, catering to your needs and schedule. Our training programs include high performance and complex seaplane ratings, utilizing the Maule M7-235 Super Rocket. With a focus on personalized instruction, we ensure a comprehensive and enjoyable learning experience. Our experienced instructors are dedicated to helping you achieve your seaplane certification goals in a friendly and supportive environment. At Florida Seaplanes, we are committed to providing top-notch training to make you a skilled and confident seaplane pilot.
services:
